function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased population density in urban areas due to neighborhood development","Impact":"Higher risk of contagious disease spread due to close proximity","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict hygiene protocols and increased healthcare infrastructure","Technologies":"Urban planning software for spacing and zoning","People":"Residents, workers, and visitors in urban neighborhoods","Owner":"Local government and urban planners"},{"Description":"Limited access to essential services within a short distance","Impact":"Reduced ability to meet the 15-minute city concept, leading to increased mobility and potential exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Investment in local infrastructure and service provision, including healthcare facilities and essential businesses","Technologies":"Digital mapping and urban design software for optimizing service locations","People":"Citizens living in urban neighborhoods","Owner":"City planners and government agencies"},{"Description":"Reliance on local businesses and trade for essential services","Impact":"Lack of diversity in supply chain for essential goods, increasing vulnerability to disruptions and shortages","Mitigation":"Support for diverse local businesses and trade networks, and alternative supply chain development","Technologies":"Supply chain management software and digital marketplace platforms","People":"Residents and consumers in urban neighborhoods","Owner":"Local business associations and government economic development agencies"}]}
